â­ â€œAn epic sci-fi adventure that no VR gamer should miss out playingâ€ - VR Without Parole

Take on the mantle of an unseasoned recruit with the task of finding a high-profile agent who went missing on a strange and highly inhospitable alien planet. 

 ğŸ† WN Unreal Engine best VR Game
 ğŸ† UploadVR's best desktop game
 ğŸ† Belgium Game Awards Best XR game

Features:

â€” Immerse yourself in one of the most visually stunning games on Quest, beautifully crafted to captivate and transport you into a meticulously realized sci-fi world.
â€” Experience the freedom of running, jumping, climbing, swimming, shooting & more with deep mechanics built from the ground up for VR
â€” Explore to find valuable resources used to craft new weapons, tools & upgrades to gain an edge
â€” Multiple difficulties to make the game the right fit for you, whether youâ€™re wanting a challenge or a more story & explorative experience
â€” Excellent sound design & an epic soundtrack that bring the rich world to life
â€” Get lost in a full-featured story campaign that takes you across a beautiful but deadly alien world

â­ "Most Visually STUNNING PC VR Game is Now on Meta Quest 2!" - BMFVR

â­ "We are looking at some of the best Meta Quest 2 Graphics ever!" - Matteo311

Hubris is an experience, a journey, a visual marvel that will redefine what you thought was possible in VR. Dive into the universe of Hubris today and embark on an adventure that will be hard to forget!

translations.long_description:
Un gioco VR di azione e avventura ambientato nell'affascinante universo fantascientifico di Hubris, un luogo unico nel suo genere.
Nel gioco, assumi il ruolo di una recluta che si sta addestrando per unirsi agli agenti del potente e temuto Ordine dell'OggettivitÃ , noto anche come "OOO".
Insieme alla pilota Lucia, raggiungi la fascia di planetoidi del sistema del pianeta Gemello alla ricerca della misteriosa agente Cyana.

Dovrai usare tutta la tua agilitÃ  e forza per sopravvivere all'ambiente ostile e alla fauna selvatica di un pianeta soggetto a un processo di terraformazione. Lungo la strada, dovrai combattere come un vero agente dell'OOO. Imparerai a creare armi e controllare veicoli e macchinari.
Ma non solo. Avrai bisogno di tutto l'aiuto possibile, dato che ci sono altre fazioni che vogliono svelare i segreti dell'OOO, ormai dimenticati da tempo.


â€¢	Vivi un'esperienza VR completa dove puoi muoverti liberamente, arrampicarti, nuotare e saltare. 
â€¢	Addentrati nell'affascinante mondo fantascientifico di Hubris, un luogo unico nel suo genere, e scopri l'inizio di una nuova saga spaziale con piÃ¹ episodi.
â€¢	Goditi una qualitÃ  grafica estremamente coinvolgente, una delle migliori disponibili su VR.
â€¢	Combatti al fianco di personaggi epici ed esuberanti contro forme di vita aliene, umanoidi e nemici meccanizzati, utilizzando strategie uniche per ciascun nemico.
â€¢	Raccogli e recupera risorse, crea armi e strumenti, controlla veicoli e dispositivi meccanici.
translations.short_description: Una recluta dell'OOO viene mandata nel sistema del pianeta Gemello per cercare l'agente Cyana. Con l'aiuto della pilota Lucia, dovrai sparare, nuotare, arrampicarti e saltare per sopravvivere all'ambiente ostile di un pianeta soggetto a terraformazione, nonchÃ© affrontare i perfidi nemici dell'OOO.

translations.long_description:
Een VR action-adventure game die zich afspeelt in het unieke en intrigerende Hubris Sci-Fi Universum.
Als speler neem je de rol aan van een rekruut in opleiding tot een agent van de machtige en gevreesde Order-of-Objectivity, ook wel bekend als de 'OOO'.
Samen met piloot Lucia word je naar de planetoÃ¯dengordel van het Twin Planet System gestuurd, om op zoek te gaan naar de mysterieuze agent Cyanha.

Je zult al je behendigheid en kracht moeten gebruiken om de barre omgeving en de wilde dieren te overleven op een planeet die geterraformed wordt. Onderweg zul je moeten vechten als een echte OOO-agent. Je leert wapens te maken en voertuigen en machines besturen.
Maar meer dan dat, zal je alle hulp nodig hebben die je kan krijgen, want er zijn andere facties die staan te popelen om de lang vergeten geheimen van de OOO te ontrafelen.


- Geniet van een volledige VR-ervaring met vrije beweging, klimmen, zwemmen en springen. 
- Maak deel uit van de unieke en intrigerende Sci-Fi wereld van Hubris, het begin van een nieuwe volledige, multi episodische ruimtesaga.
- Geniet van enkele van de beste en meest meeslepende graphics in VR.
- Vecht samen met kleurrijke epische personages tegen een mix van buitenaardse dieren, mensachtigen en gemechaniseerde vijanden, die allemaal een unieke tactiek vereisen om te verslaan.
- Verzamel en berg grondstoffen, maak wapens en gereedschappen, bestuur voertuigen en mechanische apparaten.
- Ontrafel de lang vergeten geheimen van de OOO.
translations.short_description: Een rekruut van de OOO wordt naar het Tweeling Planeten Systeem gestuurd om de mysterieuze agent Cyana te zoeken. Met de hulp van de piloot Lucia zal de speler moeten schieten, zwemmen, klimmen en springen om de barre omgeving en wilde dieren te overleven op een planeet die wordt geterraformeerd, vechtend tegen de kwaadaardige vijanden van de OOO.

changelog.change_log:
Hi All,

The latest update, Patch 1.03, has been released on the Meta Quest store . We sincerely appreciate all the valuable feedback we've received thus far, and we encourage you to continue providing us with your input. Our team is dedicated to enhancing the game's experience each day, and your contributions play a crucial role in achieving that goal. Thank you for your ongoing support!

Gameplay Enhancements and Quality of Life Improvements:

-- Implemented an option for players to force reload the gun by pressing the Right Joystick.
-- Added a button in the menu that allows for easy return to the start screen, facilitating chapter selection or starting new games.
-- Upgraded DPI in several scenes
-- Made it easier to grab ledges.
-- Made it easier to grab a gun with two hands after reloading.

Stability:

-- Addressed numerous crashes to enhance overall stability.
-- Resolved an issue where players could become stuck on loading screens indefinitely.
-- Fixed a problem where the food printed by the food printer could disappear.
-- Resolved an issue where the gun could become trapped in an upgrade loop in the 3D printer.
-- Corrected an issue where the conservationist achievement did not trigger correctly.
-- Fixed a bug where Wack's repair tool could vanish before being given to the player.
-- Improved the movement of Lucia drone in certain scenes to appear smoother.
-- Rectified an issue where the loading Pods remained open even when starting a new game.
-- Fixed a problem where players could get stuck in swimming mode while climbing out of the aquarium container.
-- Corrected an issue where the drop ships in the Loft scene did not fly over correctly.

Kind regards,

Hubris-dev team
